## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT3G28930](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT3G28930)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AIG2, AIG2A</u>
- **Gene Name:** AVRRPT2-INDUCED GENE 2, AVRRPT2 INDUCED GENE2A
- **Description:**   AIG2-like (avirulence induced gene) family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
